com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain

Interface InvoiceItem


  • public interface InvoiceItem

      Sets the name of this InvoiceItem
      void setOrder(int order)
      Sets the order of this item in the cart The position of the InvoiceItem might change the shopping cart's list, however this number represents the order the app would like this item to be placed on a receipt.

      Set the price for this InvoiceItem
      void setTaxRate(TaxRate rate)
      Set the tax rate to use for this item.

    • Method Detail

      • getInventoryId

        String getInventoryId()
        Fetch the inventoryId for this CartItem
        Returns:
        a String value which is the InventoryId

      • setInventoryId

        void setInventoryId(String inventoryId)
        Set the inventoryId for this InvoiceItem
        Parameters:
        inventoryId - a String value which is the InventoryId

      • getPrice

        BigDecimal getPrice()
        Fetch the price of this InvoiceItem
        Returns:
        a BigDecimal which is the price

      • setPrice

        void setPrice(BigDecimal price)
        Set the price for this InvoiceItem
        Parameters:
        price - A BigDecimal which is the price

      • getTaxRate

        TaxRate getTaxRate()
        The tax rate to use (or that was used) for this item for a given purchase.
        Returns:
        a TaxRate object associated with this InvoiceItem

      • setTaxRate

        void setTaxRate(TaxRate rate)
        Set the tax rate to use for this item. When the shopping cart calculates the taxes it will use this tax rate for all instances of this item.
        Parameters:
        rate - a TaxRate object that defines the tax to use.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Fetch the name of this InvoiceItem
        Returns:
        A String.

      • setName

        void setName(String name)
        Sets the name of this InvoiceItem
        Parameters:
        name - A String

      • getOrder

        int getOrder()
        Fetch the order of this item in the cart. The position of the InvoiceItem might change the shopping cart's list, however this number represents the order the app would like this item to be placed on a receipt.
        Returns:
        An int representing the order of the item in the cart.

      • setOrder

        void setOrder(int order)
        Sets the order of this item in the cart The position of the InvoiceItem might change the shopping cart's list, however this number represents the order the app would like this item to be placed on a receipt.
        Parameters:
        order - An int representing the order of the item in the cart.

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Fetch the description of this InvoiceItem
        Returns:
        A String

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(String description)
        Sets the description of this InvoiceItem
        Parameters:
        description - A String

      • getLineItemDiscount

        Discount getLineItemDiscount()
        Return the line item discount used (if any)
        Returns:
        Returns the line item discount associated with this item. null if there's none.

      • setLineItemDiscount

        void setLineItemDiscount(Discount lineItemDiscount)
        Set a line item discount. Discount can be a percentage based discount or a fixed amount.

        Note the discount applies to the entire line item including the quantity. Examples: Item: apple Cost: $1.00 Quantity: 1 Discount: $0.50 Line item total: $0.50 Item: apple Cost: $1.00 Quantity: 10 Discount: $0.50 Line item total: $9.50

        Parameters:
        lineItemDiscount - A Discount to apply to this item
